newsitem.title: USA: D&P downgrades Electronic Transfer Master Trust.
newsitem.headline: D&P downgrades Electronic Transfer Master Trust.

text.p: Duff & Phelps Credit Rating Co said Monday it downgraded its Triple B Plus foreign currency rating of Electronic Transfer Master Trust Certificates 1995-A to Triple B. The certificates remain on rating watch for further possible downgrading.
The source of payment on the certificates depends primarily on the generation of MoneyGram Payment Systems Inc transfers to Mexico.

The downgrade reflects a recent deterioration in the flow of receivables backing the certificates. The decline in receivables is mainly due to increased competition in the electronic transfer market between the United States and Mexico and a recent reduction in MoneyGram's market share.
